snippet: A military inquiry into a shoot-down that caused the largest loss of American life during a single day of the war found the actions by those on the mission were sound.
lead_paragraph: A military inquiry into a shoot-down that caused the largest loss of American life during a single day of the war found the actions by those on the mission were sound.

headline.main: Report Finds No Wrongdoing in Afghanistan Copter Crash
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Copter Crash Inquiry Clears Personnel and Equipment
headline.seo: Report Finds No Wrongdoing in Afghanistan Helicopter Crash
